article:
A 'landmass' is a contiguous area of land surrounded by ocean. Although it may
be most often written as one word to distinguish it from the usage "land
mass"âthe measure of land areaâit is also used as two words.

Landmasses include:
* Supercontinents
* Continents
* Islands

There are currently four major continuous landmasses of the Earth - Afro-
eurasia, Americas, Australia and Antarctica.
